hr.p: The Swedesboro-Woolwich School District is committed to maximizing the academic, social, and creative development of each child attending its schools. Our vision is to make sure each child is prepared to compete in a highly competitive global economy. We embrace the philosophy that all children can learn in a safe, nurturing environment that encourages children to accept and find the best in themselves and others.

a.title: Go to comments for Our Vision

p.span: The Inclusion Preschool Program is currently taking applications for the 2020-2021 school year for 3 and 4 year old children. Children must be 3 years old by May 1 for the 3 year old program and be 4 years old by Oct 1 for the developmentally older program.

a.title: Go to comments for Inclusion Preschool Program
Go to comments for 2019-2020 Yearbook Order

div.span: At times, our website links to third party, external links. These links include informative, educational websites for the sole purpose of convenience to our visitors. Due to the nature of the Internet, it is possible for a third party website to change since it was last reviewed. Therefore, Swedesboro-Woolwich School District assumes no responsibility; nor does its administrators, staff or faculty endorse the content of these sites, their servers, advertisers or the links they point to.
